description:
Strong, sleek, and speedy. The Carbon Compactor poles check off the touring wishlist in a single design. Perfect for trips where low weight and small size matter, they perform like a solid ski pole, offering good float and strength. Small enough to go inside luggage or on the exterior of your pack, they're easy to take anywhere.

  • Carbon fibre construction for lightweight resilience
  • Compact Z-Pole design for quick storage and fast deployment
  • Single pull to deploy, and single push button to collapse
  • Touring Series grip with integrated rubber grip extension
  • Webbing strap with locking buckle
  • 100mm Powder Baskets included
name: Black Diamond BD Carbon Compactor Poles
